text:
Public Health (Exemption) Amendment Order 2001

I make the following order under section 187 of the Public Health Act 1997 .

8 February 2001

M. JACOBS

Director of Public Health

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Public Health (Exemption) Amendment Order 2001 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Public Health (Exemption) Order 2000 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Public Health (Exemption) Order 2000 .

5.
The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Public Health (Exemption) Order 2000 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 February 2001

This order is administered in the Department of Health and Human Services.
